breakfast.title: Greek Yogurt Protein Bowl
breakfast.description: High-protein Greek yogurt topped with nuts, seeds, and berries for a quick power breakfast.
instructions: Mix 1 cup Greek yogurt with 1 scoop vanilla protein powder
Top with 2 tbsp chopped walnuts and 1 tbsp chia seeds
Add 1/2 cup mixed berries
Drizzle with 1 tsp honey if desired

lunch.title: Chicken Caesar Wrap
lunch.description: Grilled chicken breast wrapped with romaine lettuce and Caesar dressing in a whole wheat tortilla.
instructions: Season and grill 5 oz chicken breast for 6-7 minutes per side
Let chicken rest 2 minutes, then slice
Lay out large whole wheat tortilla, spread 2 tbsp Caesar dressing
Add sliced chicken, 1 cup chopped romaine, and 2 tbsp parmesan cheese
Roll tightly and slice in half

dinner.title: Beef and Broccoli Stir-Fry
dinner.description: Quick stir-fried lean beef with broccoli served over brown rice for a balanced dinner.
instructions: Heat 1 tbsp oil in large pan over high heat
Cook 5 oz sliced beef sirloin for 3-4 minutes until browned
Add 2 cups broccoli florets and cook 3 minutes
Add 3 tbsp soy sauce and 1 tsp garlic powder, stir 1 minute
Serve over 1/2 cup cooked brown rice

breakfast.title: Scrambled Egg and Cheese Wrap
breakfast.description: Fluffy scrambled eggs with cheese wrapped in a tortilla with spinach for a portable breakfast.
instructions: Whisk 3 whole eggs with 2 egg whites in a bowl
Scramble eggs in non-stick pan over medium heat for 3-4 minutes
Add 1/4 cup shredded cheddar cheese and fold
Place eggs and 1 cup fresh spinach in whole wheat tortilla
Roll up and serve immediately

lunch.title: Tuna and White Bean Salad
lunch.description: Protein-packed salad combining canned tuna with white beans and fresh vegetables.
instructions: Drain and rinse 1 can white beans and 1 can tuna in water
Mix beans and tuna in large bowl
Add 1 diced cucumber, 1/4 diced red onion, and 2 tbsp olive oil
Season with lemon juice, salt, and pepper
Serve over 2 cups mixed greens

dinner.title: Baked Salmon with Quinoa
dinner.description: Herb-seasoned baked salmon fillet served with fluffy quinoa and roasted vegetables.
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F and season 6 oz salmon fillet with herbs and lemon
Bake salmon for 12-15 minutes until flaky
Cook 1/3 cup quinoa according to package directions
Steam 1 cup mixed vegetables for 5 minutes
Serve salmon over quinoa with vegetables on the side

breakfast.title: Protein Pancakes
breakfast.description: Fluffy pancakes made with protein powder and eggs for a high-protein morning treat.
instructions: Blend 2 eggs, 1 scoop protein powder, 1/4 cup oats, and 1/4 cup milk
Heat non-stick pan over medium heat
Pour batter to make 3 pancakes, cook 2-3 minutes per side
Stack pancakes and top with 2 tbsp Greek yogurt
Add berries and a drizzle of sugar-free syrup

lunch.title: Turkey and Hummus Pita
lunch.description: Lean turkey slices with hummus and vegetables stuffed in a whole wheat pita pocket.
instructions: Warm whole wheat pita pocket in toaster
Spread 3 tbsp hummus inside pita
Add 4 oz sliced turkey breast
Stuff with 1/4 cup diced tomatoes and cucumber
Add handful of lettuce and serve

dinner.title: Chicken and Black Bean Bowl
dinner.description: Seasoned chicken breast over black beans with peppers and onions for a Mexican-inspired meal.
instructions: Season 6 oz chicken breast with cumin, paprika, and garlic powder
Grill chicken 6-7 minutes per side, then slice
Sauté 1/2 cup each diced bell peppers and onions for 5 minutes
Heat 3/4 cup canned black beans with seasonings
Serve chicken over beans with sautéed vegetables and 2 tbsp Greek yogurt

breakfast.title: Cottage Cheese and Fruit Bowl
breakfast.description: Creamy cottage cheese paired with fresh fruit and nuts for a refreshing high-protein start.
instructions: Scoop 1 cup cottage cheese into bowl
Top with 1/2 cup diced peaches or pineapple
Sprinkle 2 tbsp chopped almonds on top
Add 1 tbsp ground flaxseed for extra nutrition

lunch.title: Lentil and Veggie Soup
lunch.description: Hearty lentil soup loaded with vegetables and served with whole grain bread.
instructions: Sauté 1/2 cup each diced onion, carrot, and celery for 5 minutes
Add 1 cup dried red lentils and 3 cups vegetable broth
Simmer 15 minutes until lentils are tender
Season with salt, pepper, and herbs
Serve with 1 slice whole grain bread with 1 tbsp almond butter

dinner.title: Pork Tenderloin with Sweet Potato
dinner.description: Lean pork tenderloin served with roasted sweet potato and green beans for a complete meal.
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F and season 5 oz pork tenderloin with rosemary and thyme
Roast pork for 20-25 minutes until internal temp reaches 145°F
Meanwhile, roast 1 medium diced sweet potato for 25 minutes
Steam 1 cup green beans for 5 minutes
Let pork rest 5 minutes before slicing and serving

breakfast.title: Smoked Salmon Bagel
breakfast.description: Everything bagel topped with cream cheese, smoked salmon, and capers for a restaurant-quality breakfast.
instructions: Toast 1 everything bagel until golden
Spread 2 tbsp cream cheese on both halves
Layer 3 oz smoked salmon on bottom half
Top with thin red onion slices and 1 tsp capers
Close sandwich and serve immediately

lunch.title: Chickpea Salad Sandwich
lunch.description: Mashed chickpea salad with vegetables served on whole grain bread for a plant-based protein lunch.
instructions: Drain and mash 1 can chickpeas, leaving some chunks
Mix with 2 tbsp mayo, 1 diced celery stalk, and 1/4 diced onion
Add 1 tbsp lemon juice, salt, and pepper
Toast 2 slices whole grain bread
Spread chickpea salad on bread with lettuce and tomato

dinner.title: Shrimp and Zucchini Noodles
dinner.description: Garlic butter shrimp served over spiralized zucchini noodles for a light but protein-rich dinner.
instructions: Spiralize 2 medium zucchini into noodles using spiralizer or peeler
Heat 1 tbsp butter in large pan over medium-high heat
Cook 6 oz large shrimp for 2-3 minutes per side until pink
Add minced garlic and cook 30 seconds
Toss in zucchini noodles for 2 minutes, season with lemon and parmesan
